body.name: JBL Flip 4 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Black) (Renewed)
features: Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns playing impressive stereo sound
Built-in 3000mAh rechargeable li-ion battery supports up to 12 hours of playtime
IPX7 waterproof means no more worrying about rain or spills; you can even submerge flip 4 in water
Ubl connect+ allows you to link more than 100 JBL connect+ enabled speakers together to amplify the party
body.description: JBL Flip 4 IPX7 Waterproof Wireless Portable Bluetooth Rechargeable USB Speaker (Black) (Renewed)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What kind of wizardry is this?
reviews.reviewText: If you are thinking about buying this speaker, don't think, just buy it. Not only does it look cool, it sounds awesome! You will be surprised at the huge sound, deep bass, crisp highs. I hosted a small get together in my living room and pumped heavy metal through this baby for 6 hours straight without worry of it dying. My guests were surprised when they saw the speaker, they were expecting something much bigger; like a boombox from 1985! I owned a Bose Soundlink and This JBL sounds just as good, if not a little better, and more bass, and it's cheaper! I have had it at full volume and there is no crackle or distortion. If you lay it longways, like on its side, you can really hear the stereo sound despite the 2 speakers being so close together. I love this speaker and everything about it. The design is sleek enough to put anywhere, the buttons are perfectly and simply placed, it's rugged and heavy for its size and not in a bad way! There is nothing I do not like about this speaker, I've tried to think of something bad........and then I connected my phone and Blasted some music and could not think of anything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I still love the JBL Flip 4
reviews.reviewText: JBL converted me from Bose. I own 2 of these JBL Flip 4s. I keep one in the shower and one next to my bed. I also bought a JBL Charge 4 that I gave to my girlfriend. I also own a JBL Extreme XL2 in my garage. I also gifted JBL Flip 4s to both my kids and my Dad. I actually like the Flip 4 more than the others in the JBL line up. It is a perfect blend of portability, sound quality, and durability. Solidly constructed. I’ve had my primary JBL Flip 4 for about 3 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been 2 1/2 years of solid use
reviews.reviewText: So I bought this 2 1/2 years ago and battery life still top notch and only now I’m having issue with the bass rattle and sound dimming but for 2 1/2 years I will say I’ve used this damn near everyday for as long as the battery would last (usually 5-8 hours) and I mean at a solid 3/4 volume, bass hitting, straight machine put in work while I wrenched. If your looking for a solid speaker this thing is the one, JBL has me buying my next from them 💪🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Good Speaker for an Even Better Price
reviews.reviewText: The JBL Flip 2 has been a favorite for a while. It has two 6 watt speakers giving it 12 watts of power for something this small!The Flip 2 is a fantastic speaker especially at this refurbished price. The MSRP for this speaker is around $100, but I was able to buy it for $65 refurbished which is a steal!So what came in the box?1. You get one hard case for the speaker itself.2. You get a little cute instruction manual that tells you all you need to know about the Flip 2.3. You get one micro usb charging cable along with the wall adapter.4. You get the speaker itself of course!Let me start with the amazing features:1. Even though the unit is refurbished, it came looking like new.2. You get 12 watts of power from something so small!3. You have hands free calling so you can answer/hear your calls loudly from across your room or office.4. The sound sounds great! I'm just the average consumer, so I just want something that works, sounds amazing, and won't make me go broke. This speaker gets loud and sounds great while doing it.The lacking:1. The battery life is a bit short. I am only getting about 3-4 hours on a full charge. This is not a really big issue as I'm only usually sitting at my desk.2. The bass is a bit lacking. Don't get me wrong, the Flip 2 sounds amazing, but for bassier music, I do with there was a bit more...oomph.3. The charging cable sometimes wiggles out of the port a bit too easily. If you move it, it might slip out.4. The speaker turns on when the cable is plugged in. Not a big deal, but it is a bit annoying to turn the speaker off whenever you first plug it in.So what, should I buy it?YES! The Flip 2 is a great option and is now even better at $65 refurbished. You can't really go wrong for the price and you know you are going to get a speaker that works well and sounds great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 2nd Flip 4 Purchase
reviews.reviewText: I Purchased My Very First J.B.L. Flip 4 Portable Speaker Way Back in 2018 Or So. It Had Served Me Well For a Good Many Years. The Only Thing That Started To Go Wrong With It Was That It Would Not Keep a Charge So I Always Had To Make Sure It Was Plugged In To A Charging Source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top notch speaker!
reviews.reviewText: Holds excellent charge, play for hours and only goes down by less than 1 out of 4 bars. Sound is excellent for it's small size. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s compact easy to carry to all places and sounds great
reviews.reviewText: This little speaker it’s the soul of our party’s now we used all the time for family friends come together to our place we love it so far ,
Pésima calidad tanto de audio como de batería.Quizás no es la marca si no el que me la vendió por este medio.

i m telling truth. i was audio engineer since 1980, when i was posted All India Radio Jalandhar, monitoring audio quality of broadcasted urdu service. i know quality of audio reproduced by an amplifier. This jbl product really amazing, with best bass, without distortion (i think less than .12%), N/S 86. i m very much setisfied with quality and best design of this product. thanks to JBL, supplier and Amazon (my best liked wordwide company)
Opened this after 8 days of delivery, charging cable is not working ......highly disappointed.Can not Amazon persons check all such important points before sending it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best product ever bought in my life. In love with my JBL
reviews.reviewText: The best product ever i bought in my life i seriously in love with this product. The sound quality the base the clearity with that much sound is incomparable to any sound box. Cost is more because its worth to pay that much for this quality. No doubt if affording is not a problem then close your eyes and go for it.

reviews.reviewTitle: This was a rebuilt speaker and so far has worked very well indeed
reviews.reviewText: We have enjoyed the sound and the mobility of the speaker and recommend.
